topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969–1976, Volume E–15, Part 2, Documents on Western Europe, 1973–1976, Second, Revised Edition
topic.body: This volume documents the U.S. relationship with Western Europe from 1973 to 1976. This second, revised edition incorporates a chapter on Italy that was not included in the first edition, which was published in 2014.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969–1976, Volume E–15, Part 2, Documents on Western Europe, 1973–1976, Second, Revised Edition
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
